description: Canvas X Draw is available for Windows and macOS, but only the Mac version supports CVDTPL files (the Windows version saves drawing templates as .TPL files, by default). The Canvas X Draw templates make it easier for users to create new drawings, such as flowcharts, presentations, or maps, with similar appearance and content while saving time.
You can create a CVDTPL file with Canvas X Draw in macOS by selecting File â†’ Save As Template... .
